title: Update website branding to 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' while preserving Van Gogh theme

requirements.text: Update the Navigation component branding text to display 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' in all caps, replacing the current 'STARRY NIGHT EXPERIENCE' text

quotes: CHANGE THE HEADER/LOGO TO 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES'

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation header displays 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' in all caps
Van Gogh Starry Night styling and color palette remain unchanged

requirements.text: Update the HomePage hero section h1 title element to display 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' instead of 'Starry Night Experience'

quotes: CHNAGE THE TITLE TO 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES'

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section h1 displays 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES'
Van Gogh-inspired artistic typography styling is preserved
Starry Night artwork and visual theme remain intact

requirements.text: Update the browser page title in frontend/index.html to 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES'

quotes: UPADTE THE BROWSER TAB TITLE ALSO

acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab displays 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' as the page title

constraints: Preserve all Van Gogh Starry Night visual theme elements including colors (#0B3D91, #FFD700, #0A192F, #1E90FF), flowing shapes, and artwork
Keep the existing Starry Night-inspired artwork in the hero section
Maintain all current Van Gogh-inspired typography and design elements
nonGoals: Removing or modifying the Starry Night visual theme
Changing color palettes or design elements
Updating Footer branding (already shows 'House of Vigilantes')
Modifying Van Gogh artwork or artistic styling
